name: Robelle 20 x 40 ft Heavy Duty Blue Winter Pool Cover for Inground Pools, 5 ft Overlap (25 x 45 ft Cover Size), Solid 8 x 8 Scrim, 2.36 oz/yd2, 10-Year Warranty, Style: 352040R
short_description: Heavy Duty winter pool cover for 20 x 40 ft. in-ground pools. This pool cover has a 5 foot overlap, which is the material included beyond the pool size, making this pool cover easier to install. Since 1973 Robelle has been offering the best pool covers for pool owners. This cover has more than twice as much overlap as other brands, making it the easiest pool cover to install. Including overlap, the cover size is: 25 x 45 feet.

This Heavy Duty pool cover is constructed with heavy duty polyethylene that weighs 2.36 ounces per square yard (80 grams per square meter). The material is woven with a 8 x 8 scrim. Scrim is the number of threads per square inch. Material weight and scrim are the best indicators of the overall durability and expected longevity of your pool cover.

With over 50 years of experience, Robelle has designed this Heavy Duty winter pool cover with an exceptional focus on quality for this season and years to come. Constructed 18% heavier than industry standard. Backed by a 10-Year Warranty that is the best in the industry. We are real swimming pool experts that are here to help with all of your swimming pool needs.

This is a solid winter pool cover that will not allow water to pass through. More pool owners have trusted Robelle for their pool closing needs than any other brand. Exceed your expectations when you choose a Robelle brand pool cover.
This pool cover will protect your pool from winter elements throughout the offseason. Designed for superior protection against snow and ice.
Cover should be able to float loosely on the water, consider going up a pool size if you have steps or a buddy seat.
Using vinyl water weights around the perimeter of the pool cover is the only method of installation we recommend.

We do not recommend having excess cover material on your deck. Fold excess materials under water weights. Where cover may be exposed to corners or decking please pad the cover with material from an old cover or another soft material.
Includes loops for water weights.
Water weights sold separately.
product_description: The Robelle Super Winter Pool Cover is a heavy-duty solid winter pool cover. Solid pool covers do not allow water to pass through their material. The Robelle Super Winter Pool Cover features a heavy-duty 8 x 8 scrim. The heavy-duty polyethylene material used for this cover weighs 2.36 oz./yd2. Both the scrim count and material weight are the best indicators of the strength and durability for your pool cover. This is a heavy-duty pool cover designed to protect your pool from the winter elements. The Robelle Super Winter Pool Cover features an imperial blue topside and a black underside. Please order by your pool size, as the overlap goes beyond the pool size listed. This cover includes a five-foot overlap. Please order a larger size cover if you have steps (or any other irregularity) protruding from your pool. Water tube loops are placed around the perimeter of the pool cover. Water tubes sold separately. Only water tubes should be used to install this pool cover. No other method of installation is recommended. This cover should be able to comfortably float on the pool water without excessive stress. This cover is not meant to be used as a debris cover during the swimming season. This winter pool cover is intended to be used during the off-season..
product_details: Closure Type To Be Used With Vinyl Water Tubes/Bags
Product Care Instructions Occasional cleaning and proper storage when not in use

name: QH.HOME Winter Round Pool Cover for 18 Ft Bestway/Intex/Coleman Frame Above Ground Pool, [Excellent Windproof ] with Fast Tightening Patented Ratchet& Weight-Bearing Rings,Cold and UV Resistant
short_description: 【Pay attention to choose the right size】QH.HOME 18ft pool cover is designed for 18ft metal frame pool by default, if you have an 18ft steel wall pool please choose 21ft metal frame pool (the reason is that the width of the outer edge of the steel wall round pool is increased by 6-10 inches, and the required size is larger, please refer to the size comparison chart)

【Exclusive Patented Triple Windproof Design】 double insurance reinforcement of ratchet rope system + segmented drawstring, adjustable tension segment by segment, fits perfectly to the curvature of round pool edges, and with the pool cover edge load-bearing hanging loop (for hanging sandbags/heavy objects), it can withstand strong winds of more than 100 miles per hour.

【Upgraded Tear Resistant Design】The edges of our round pool cover are designed with a lay-flat seamless design (no risk of edge cracking compared to traditional double stitching). Upgraded 500D Oxford fabric has a tear strength of 330 lbs (lab test), which increases the durability by 3 times, far more than 420D/210D fabrics, ensuring the pool cover is stable for long-term use.

【Always Keep Pool Water Clean】 This pool cover is made of upgraded 500D high quality waterproof material, with waterproof sealing strips on all the top seams, which effectively blocks rainwater from seeping in and pool water from overflowing, keeps dirt and leaves away from the water, makes the pool water cleaner, reduces the number of times you need to clean and the use of chemicals, lowers the cost of maintenance, and saves you money and effort.

【UV Protection&Insulation】 PU-coated 500D fabric blocks 99% of UV rays (UPF50+ certified), protecting the pool water and cover from sun damage and preventing algae growth. Black fabric absorbs heat to raise water temperature by 8-12 degrees Fahrenheit during the day while reducing nighttime heat loss by 95% - dual-mode climate control that outperforms silver-coated pool covers.

【Safer & Eco-Friendly Material】Our pool cover is certified by Amazon “Climate Friendly”, made of odorless and environmentally friendly PU transparent material, which is safe to use even in hot environments, won't melt or leave black residue, and is safer and more environmentally friendly than silver coated material. Let you and your family enjoy the whole summer.
product_details: Product Care Instructions Clean as needed. Store properly when not in use.

short_description: DOHENY’S OFFERS ALL TYPES OF WINTER POOL COVERS - IN ALL DIFFERENT PRICE POINTS TO FIT ANY BUDGET! Choose from our inexpensive Economy-Grade cover to our huge selection of finer covers - we have the right cover for you!

WE OFFER THREE DIFFERENT SYLES OF WINTER COVERS! Our SOLID COVERS come in several different grades - while all featuring our triple-laminated construction that includes an extra-tight weave to resist tearing and are coated with an extra-thick polyethylene for durability. They also feature an industry leading 5’ overlap to accommodate an adequate water drop while allowing perfect water tube placement.

Our MESH COVERS are available in two different styles - STANDARD MESH and the state-of-the-art MICRO MESH. Both are designed to allow excess water to drain back into the pool - just vacuum the fine silt from the bottom of the pool in the Spring! The MICRO-MESH cover’s top fibers are coated with a reflective silver compound that helps melt snow more rapidly to reduce cover wear and tear!

ALL COVERS COME COMPLETE WITH HEAVY-DUTY WATER BAG LOOPS (no water bags included) stitched approximately every 4 feet around the covers perimeter. Loops help keep bags firmly anchored preventing roll away.

name: SWIMLINE HYDROTOOLS Supreme Guard Heavy Duty Winter Pool Cover for Inground Swimming Pools | for 20 X 40 FT Rectangle Pools | 25 X 45 FT Cover Size | Green/Black | Water Tube Sleeves | CO122545LS
short_description: {WINTER POOL COVERS} This Hydrotools by Swimline pool cover is designed to protect traditional inground swimming pools during the winter season. Hydrotools covers prevent snow ice and debris from entering the pool, increasing pool longevity.

{PERFECT SIZE} This pool cover is best suited for 20 X 40 FT Rectangle Shaped pools. The actual cover measures 25 X 45 FT leaving plenty of overlapping material to ensure a good fit while leaving room for accessories such as Hydrotools air pillows.

{SUPREME MATERIAL} Hydrotools By Swimline Supreme line of winter covers feature a solid 12 x 12 scrim thread count material, ensuring no water or debris passes through during the winter season. The covers are also UV & Chemical resistant.

{EASY TO INSTALL} Featuring perimeter attachment grommets and a tight durable design, this winterizing pool cover is super easy to install. Comes with integrated sleeves designed to accommodate water tubes and other cover-weight accessories

{SIZING GUIDE} Your Swimline cover should be able to naturally float loosely on the water. If you have large top rails, consider going up a size. Tighten the cover so it feels secure around your pool without feeling overstressed.
product_description: Introducing the SWIMLINE HYDROTOOLS Heavy Duty Pool Covers, your ultimate solution for preserving the quality and longevity of your above-ground swimming pool through the winter season. Designed with the highest standards, our pool covers effectively keep out snow, ice, and debris, ensuring your pool remains in pristine condition, ready for the next swim season. Every Hydrotools cover is engineered from our unique woven fabric material. This features a solid tight weave that guarantees no water or debris will pass through, ensuring optimum protection during winter's harshest months. To combat environmental factors, the covers are UV and chemical resistant, adding to their durability and lifespan. Installation is as easy as can be. Each cover comes equipped with perimeter attachment grommets, and a lightweight yet robust design. This means you have everything you need for a hassle-free installation right out of the box. Once installed, the cover should naturally float loosely on the water, fitting securely around your pool without any overstress. Moreover, our pool covers are not standalone solutions but part of a wider protective system within the Hydrotools by Swimline expansive assortment of pool accessories. They pair seamlessly with our extensive range of winterizing accessories such as ice equalizer air pillows, water tubes, and wall bags. With the integrated perimeter grommets, you can use these accessories for additional support and peace of mind. At Swimline, we take pride in the quality and variety of our cover options, designed to fit all sizes and strengths of pools. Our dedication to excellence is rooted in our USA headquarters in New York, where each product is thoughtfully designed to meet your needs. Rest assured, we stand by our products, offering a one-year warranty against any manufacturing defects. This is our Swimline promise to you.
